alert.note: Alert for Blaine; Loup (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 5:37PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Loup, northwestern Custer and southern Blaine Counties through 615 PM CDT... At 537 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Dunning, or 13 miles southwest of Brewster, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Anselmo, Dunning, Milburn, Milburn Diversion Dam State Wildlife Management Area and Linscott. This includes Highway 2 between mile markers 233 and 259. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for central and north central Nebraska.
